item.title: BJP Leaders Urge DK Aruna to Address Key Development Issues in Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Senior BJP leaders from Jogulamba Gadwal district submitted a memorandum to BJP National Vice President and Palamuru MP D.K. Aruna, highlighting key issues in the region and seeking her intervention in addressing them at the central level.
The memorandum, led by former BJP district president S. Ramachandra Reddy, Aija mandal BJP president Gopalakrishna, senior leaders Sanjeeva Reddy, Lakshman Goud, Pulikal Rajasekhar, and Pradeep Swamy, outlined several pressing concerns, including:
1. Approva...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh Veeresh

item.title: MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy Distributes Kalyana Lakshmi & Shaadi Mubarak Cheques to 900 Beneficiaries in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy participated as the chief guest in the Kalyana Lakshmi / Shaadi Mubarak cheque distribution program held today at the MLA camp office in Gadwal district headquarters. The event aimed to provide financial assistance to 900 beneficiaries from various villages and towns across the Gadwal constituency.
